Title: Relates to a working group to examine environmental health at schools
Summary: Creates a working group for environmental health at schools to establish protocols for inspection, testing and remediation of hazards; and an office of environmental health in schools ombudsman within the department of environmental conservation to receive complaints and respond to inquiries.
LawCode: Add Art 26-A ยง730, Exec L; add Art 3 Title 4 ยง3-0401, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the environmental conservation law, in relation to a working group for environmental health at schools
